archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.7c: c) performed using approved supporting material or activities (e.g. an agreed Business Impact Reference Table (BIRT), exercises for practitioners and details about the target environment).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
